You will be redirected to BCA KlikPay once you tap \'Confirm Payment\' button.
For payment, you can choose to use KlikBCA Individual Account or BCA credit card.
For more information about BCA KlikPay please contact Halo BCA at (021) 1500888 or visit http://klikbca.com/KlikPay/klikpay.html.
4.\tChoose \'account number\' that you want to use for payment.
5.\tInput BCA Virtual Account Number and click \'OK\'.
6.\tBCA Virtual Account Number and your account information will appear on the payment confirmation page and then click \'Send\'.
8.\tEnter amount to be transferred then click \'OK\'.
Please make sure that you have a User ID for CIMB Clicks and have registered your mPIN before going through with the payment.
Transaction will be cancelled if payment is not completed within 2 hours.
Please make sure that there is no pop-up blocker on your browser.
Make sure you have registered your mobile phone number for Mandiri e-cash.
Enter your phone number and PIN.
Please wait for an SMS from Mandiri e-cash that contains your One Time Password (OTP).
Enter the 6 digit OTP, then click \'pay\' to make payment.
If you haven\'t received the OTP or the OTP has expired, click \'cancel\' and retry your transaction.
After confirming your payment, we will issue you a unique Payment Code number.
Note down your Payment Code and total amount. Don\'t worry, we will also mail you a copy of the payment instructions.
Go to an Indomaret store near you and provide the cashier with the Payment Code number.
The cashier will then confirm the transaction by asking for the transaction amount and the merchant name.
Confirm the payment with the cashier.
Your transaction is successful! You should be receiving an email confirming your payment. Please keep your Indomaret payment receipt just in case you need help via support.
On the main menu, Choose \'Other Transaction\'.
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press \'Correct\'.
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on confirmation page. If the confirmation page is right, press \'Correct\'.
Choose your payment account and press \'Correct\'.

Payment via BRI e-Pay will be processed online and your BRI bank account balance will be deducted automatically based on your total amount.

Send a text message to Telkomsel, type TOKEN <PIN>, send to 2828.
Input the token sent from Telkomsel\'s reply into T-CASH TOKEN field.
Your transaction will expire unless you complete your payment in 30 minutes.
Dial *123*120# with a registered XL phone number.
You will receive an SMS confirmation from XL.
